snippet.title: Horizon Forbidden West | Major Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Jump back into the Forbidden West.

This major update to Horizon Forbidden West lets you take on the wilds once again in a new journey with New Game +, without losing your character progression and inventory. Take on the toughest challenges the world has to offer with Ultra Hard mode. Experience the visual enhancements with our improved Performance Mode. All this, and more, are included in patch 1.14, LIVE NOW!

Learn more about Horizon Forbidden West via http://horizonforbiddenwest.com/

©2022 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. Developed by Guerrilla. Horizon Forbidden West is a registered trademark or trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC.
